mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crew (user_id, guild_id, status) VALUES (${userId}, ${guildId}, ${status})
mapper.select: SELECT crew_id AS crew, user_id AS userId, guild_id AS guildId, status AS status FROM crew WHERE guild_id = #{guildId} AND user_id != #{userId}
SELECT crew_id AS crew, user_id AS userId, guild_id AS guildId, status AS status FROM crew WHERE guild_id = #{guildId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM crew WHERE guild_id = #{guildId} AND user_id = #{userId}
